text: Dagou Willie Anderson Britto (born 1 June 1996), known as Willie Britto, is an Ivorian football player who plays as rightback for Swiss Super League club FC Zürich. ==Professional career== On 4 July 2019, Britto signed with FC Zürich on a 4 year contract. Britto made his professional debut with Zürich in a 4-0 Swiss Super League loss to FC Lugano on 21 July 2019. ==International career== Britto debuted for the Ivory Coast football team in a 1-1 friendly tie with Zambia on 25 October 2014. He represented the Ivory Coast U23s at the 2015 Toulon Tournament. ==References== ==External Links== * Soccerway Profile * FCZ Profile * SFL Profile * SAPO Profile Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:People from Bas-Sassandra District Category:Ivorian footballers Category:Ivory Coast international footballers Category:Ivory Coast under-20 international footballers Category:FC Zürich players Category:Swiss Super League players Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Ivorian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Switzerland
title: Willie Britto
